metadata.title: CVE-2022-48712 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ext4: fix error handling in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode()  Current code does not fully takes care of krealloc() error case, which could lead to silent memory corruption or a kernel bug.  This patch fixes that.  Also it cleans up some duplicated error handling logic from various functions in fast_commit.c file.
